task_summary: Detect the pot lid, approach above it, compute a top grasp, pick it, verify the grasp, lift upward, and retreat while holding the lid.

task_long_description.overview: The robot must lift the lid off a small pot placed on a box on a tabletop. The sequence begins with perception to localize the pot lid, followed by a safe approach from above. A top grasp is computed for the lid’s knob, the gripper opens, aligns, and executes a pick. After confirming the object is in the gripper, the robot lifts along +Z to clear the pot and retreats to a safe distance. The scene includes a Stretch-like arm, the pot with lid, a tabletop, and surrounding objects; motion is primarily vertical to avoid collisions.
preconditions: Robot is initialized with free workspace
Pot with removable lid is on the table
Camera provides view of the lid
stepwise_plan: Check visibility of the pot lid; detect/scan if needed
Move to a pregrasp above the lid and open the gripper
Compute a top grasp pose and verify availability
Align to target and execute pick
Lift vertically to clear pot and retreat to safety
success_criteria: Lid is lifted clear of the pot without collisions
Robot reaches a safe retreat pose with lid in gripper
failure_and_recovery: Perception fail: fall back to DetectObject then ScanForTarget
Grasp fail: recompute grasp and retry pick after re-align
Insufficient lift: execute additional MoveDelta along +Z
task_long_description.termination: Tree succeeds when the lid is detected, grasped, lifted above the pot, and the robot has retreated to a safe distance while still holding it.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: lift up a lid from the pot

node_specs.description: Checks if the pot lid is visible in the current view.
Runs a detector to localize the lid.
Active scan if initial detection fails.
Go to a pregrasp pose above the lid.
Prepare gripper for grasping the lid knob.
Compute top grasp on lid knob and store it.
Align end-effector to the lid for grasping.
Execute grasp to pick the lid.
Lift the lid vertically away from the pot.
Back off to a safe distance while holding the lid.

failure_modes: Lid not detected due to glare or occlusion
Insufficient lift; lid still contacts pot
recovery_strategy: Fallback to detection/scan when visibility check fails
Recompute grasp and re-align, then retry Pick
Issue additional MoveDelta +Z and re-check clearance
If slip detected, lower, reopen, and reattempt grasp
assumptions: Frames show a pot with a removable lid accessible from above.
Top grasp of the lid knob is feasible with a parallel gripper.

expected_success_criteria: Robot performs MoveDelta along +Z and clears the pot rim
